public class Assig3_1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		 int  integerNumber= 12345;
		 double doubleNumber= integerNumber;
		 System.out.println("Double:" + doubleNumber);
	}

}
// Question 2
public class Assig3_2 {
    
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double doubleNumber=1235.25;
		int integerNumber =(int)doubleNumber;
		System.out.print("int : "+ integerNumber);
	}

}

// Question 3


public class Assig3_3 {
        public static void main(String[] args) {
            // TODO Auto-generated method stub
            int num=123;
            float num1=12.52f;
            double num2= 123.454;
            int sum =(int) num1 +(int)num2+ num;
            int sub=(int)num1-(int)num2-num;
            int mult =(int)num1*(int)num2*num;
            int div=(int)num1/(int)num2/num;
            System.out.println("sum: "+sum);
            System.out.println("Sub: "+ sub);
            System.out.println("Multi:"+ mult);
            System.out.println("Division: "+div);
        }
    
    
    }
    


// Question 4

public class Assig3_4 {
    public static void main(String avg[]) {
        int integerNumber= 12345;
        double doubleNumber= integerNumber;
        float floatNumber= integerNumber;
        //boolean booleanNumber = integerNumber;
        //String stringCharacter= integerNumber;
        System.out.println("double: "+ doubleNumber);
        System.out.println("float: "+ floatNumber);
        //System.out.println("boolean"+booleanNumber);
        //System.out.println("String :"+stringCharacter);
                
}}
